attributes.action: Make period products free to everyone so we don't have to pay for them
attributes.background: I want the government to make all period products free to everyone so we don't have to pay for them as why should we have to pay for something that is natural.THIS IS UNACCEPTABLE FOR US TO HAVE TO PAY FOR SOMETHING THAT COME NATURALLY

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition calling for the same action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/584711
